title: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
description: When performing the 'Revert' action in the Java editor, it takes significantly longer compared to the 'close and reopen' action.
OB:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1) Open an editor on the file 'org.eclipse.swt.custom.StyledText.java' from the source folder 'Eclipse SWTCustom Widgets' in the project 'org.eclipse.swt' in the open source repository.
2) Select the end of the first line and add a space character to mark the file as dirty.
3) Click on the close box in the editor tab.
4) When prompted with the 'do you want to save changes' dialog, select 'no'.
5) Double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it.

Expected Behavior:
The contents of the file should be replaced with the original version promptly.

Observed Behavior:
When selecting 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor, it takes approximately 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original version.
